IBM Genius of Things Summit
Get connected with top IoT genies and enter into the new Digital World
Register Here
October 04th, 2017
08:00 AM - 06:00 PM EST
Boston
Think how prodigious will it be if you can connect and analyse your data digitally with just a single click! Here comes IBM's Genius of Things Summit which is going to kick off at Boston on October 04th, 2017. This allows you to connect with the real digital transformation genies behind today's IoT world. Miracle along with it's technical crew is going to mark its presence at the event by presenting some really amazing speaker sessions around the Digital Transformation. And, will also get a chance to meet one-on-one with the IoT experts and get to learn about the impacts of IoT on industries in the recent days.

Networking
IBM Watson IoT - Industry 4.0
Watson IoT Platform is a smart and scalable IoT Hub for connecting your devices and sensors. It allows you to connect, secure, manage and monitor all your IoT Solutions within the platform like real time events, business decisions, rule engine and edge rules which will be out of box and therefore, adds value to your IoT landscape. Watson also has a capability of using the power of Cognitive services integrated with your IoT Solution.
Our IoT Services
Miracle Software Systems, Inc. provides you with a wide variety of IoT Services with an IoT Engagement Model. We provide Thought Leadership and IoT Strategy, through brainstorming around business use cases for IoT. Miracle can help you in creating a prototype that best suits the IoT Solution based on the given business inputs. We can also furnish you with the best assistance in choosing the right IoT Device/Gateway which streams data to IoT Hub. We, being your Architects we think, design, build and accelerate the End-to-End flow for your Business Model.
